definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Just saying “um” or “ah” here and there won’t do it.
sentences.chinese: 若只是一味的“嗯”或“啊”这样不利于谈话的进行。

sentences.english: He that lives upon hope, dies farting.
sentences.chinese: 一味靠希望活着的人，死时不值一文。

sentences.english: We are playing the fool with ourselves because of careless reading.
sentences.chinese: 因为阅读不仔细，我们一味糊弄自己。

sentences.english: But someone else's way of looking at things – Barthelme's, for instance – should not be chased after by other writers.
sentences.chinese: 一味地追随和模仿他人对事物的观察方法是徒劳的。

sentences.english: Objiective To develop a method for the determination of Luteolin in Duyiwei Pellet.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立独一味微丸中木犀草素含量的测定方法。

sentences.english: A woman should learn in quietness and full submission.
sentences.chinese: 女人要沉静学道，一味地顺服。

sentences.english: It should be a traditional drug.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛香为一味传统的中药。

sentences.english: They are fools who adulate every decision of their leaders.
sentences.chinese: 对领导的每一个决定一味奉承的人们是蠢材。

sentences.english: I think that person can not blindly self-surrender, for example, to make friends.
sentences.chinese: 我认为做人不可以一味的忍让，比如说交朋友。

sentences.english: Yuo should reason with the child instead of just telling hm to obey.
sentences.chinese: 你应该跟孩子讲道理，而不要让他只是一味地服从。

sentences.english: Let a woman learn in silence with full submission.
sentences.chinese: 女人要沉静学道，一味地顺服。

sentences.english: Scutellaria baicalensis Georgi is one of the TCM( Traditional Chinese Medicine ) which is frequently used in clinical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 黄芩是一味常用中药，在临床上使用频率较高。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The method can be used for the quality control for Lamiophlomis rotata soft capsules.
sentences.chinese: 结论本方法可以用于独一味软胶囊的质量控制。

sentences.english: To always negate is not the way to create what is new and original.
sentences.chinese: 一味的否定并非就是标新立异。

sentences.english: You cannot blindly expect a tool to make good decisions for you.
sentences.chinese: 您不能一味地期望一个工具可为您制定出好的决策。

sentences.english: Insisting otherwise is imprudent and impractical.
sentences.chinese: 一味否认这一点是轻率和不切实际的。

definition: to neglect the root and pursue the tip (idiom)/to neglect fundamentals and concentrate on details
to produce the opposite of the desired result
anxious for quick results (idiom); to demand instant success/impatient for result/impetuous
to act rashly/to act precipitously regardless of the consequences/reckless/foolhardy/daredevil
lit. to invert root and branch (idiom); fig. confusing cause and effect/to stress the incidental over the fundamental/to put the cart before the horse
to follow blindly/to conform slavishly/unthinking obedience
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to stop before going too far (idiom); to stop while one can/don't overdo it/stop while you're ahead
